Multiple media outlets of The Times Grou: including India Times and Times of India, published articles with the narrative that Amitabh Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan paid last respects to a domestic staffer, based on the image of them lifting a bier.
Times Now reported that the bier in the: year-old domestic staffer who died in Mumbai.
Alt News: a fact-checking organization, verified that the image published by The Times Group was old and unrelated. The picture originally belonged to an incident where the Bachchans were lifting the bier of Amitabh Bachchan's secretary, Sheetal Jain, who passed away on June 8, 2019.
